title: Born to Ride
description: Love. Lust. Betrayal.   She never meant to fall in love.  All Audrey Becker wanted to do was reunite with her estranged father, Sons of Chaos MC President Trent ‘Trigg’ Becker. She didn’t want to fall for one of his arch-rivals, but when she meets the Vice President of the Reapers MC, the sexy young Vince Jackson, she can’t stop herself from tumbling head over heels.  Torn between the warring clubs and struggling to adjust to her new lifestyle, Audrey tries her best to overcome her fears… but what will happen when she is forced to choose?  This is a gritty yet sweet MC romance novel with violence, rough language and love scenes as scorching hot as they come. For adults only 18+ Word count: 45,000+ word
author: Eva Grace
